# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product holds great value to us, but considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement. I am offering it to you for $125. This price not only reflects the quality of the product but also allows for a fair exchange. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
